title: Zed W-Q-W combo bug
body:
BUG : If Zed quickly casts W>Q>W combo, the Shuriken (Q) casted by the Living Shadow (W) will travel only half its range thus significantly reducing the distance traveled by the projectile. I remade the experiment multiple times, each time the BUG occurs.
Recreation rate for the bug: 100 %

replies.body:
Hey Nosferat Alucard,

Thanks for the report! As Riot Exgeniar [mentioned](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/svKZjZZ0-zed-w-q-w-bug-gameplay?comment=0000) this is something he's working to resolve!
When is the Q cast from the shadow? Before or after the swap? it's important to know that.
